name: Fartopia
description:
Here is a  project I am currently working on for the lulz. You could describe it as a mish-mash of kid humour, hard platforming, and never ending loop of silly noises. But hey, share your highscore in the comments if you manage to power through it! 
There are only a couple levels as the moment of this writing, but if the feedback is good and constructive  I plan to add a lot more silly stuff to this game.


I started pixel art a couple months ago and started this game a couple days ago on gamemaker. I do not have any experience in graphic design nor in making games or coding in general, all I have is a bunch of giggling friends on discord .


Music: Pulsar by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
